titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER TO MODIFY THE PRETRIAL SCHEDULING ORDER signed by Judge Morrison C. England, Jr on 2/25/11. The New dates are as follows: Trial is SET for 8/6/2012. Final Pretrial Conference is SET for 6/7/2012. Last day to file replies to evidentiary or procedural Motions 4/20/12. Last day to file oppositions to evidentiary or procedural Motions 4/13/12. titleInfo.title: Large v. Regents of the University of California, et al
titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER signed by Magistrate Judge Dale A. Drozd on 3/26/12; NOTICE IS HEREBY GIVEN that Defendants the REGENTS OF THE UNIVERSITY OF CALIFORNIA and EDUARDO BLUMWALD will, and hereby do, apply ex parte to this Court to compel the mental examination of Plaintiff MARINA LARGE currently set for hearing on April 13, 2012. However, the parties have agreed to request that the matter be heard on March 30, 2012 on the courts law and motion calendar with the parties joint statement to be filed by March 28, 2012. This motion will be based on this Ex Parte Application, the supporting Memorandum of Points and Authorities, the declaration of David P.E. Burkett required by Local Rule 144(e) and the exhibits attached thereto, the briefing on the motion to compel mental examination and any other evidence or argument that may be presented before or at the hearing.(Matson, R)

titleInfo.title: Large v. Regents of the University of California, et al
titleInfo.subTitle: MEMORANDUM AND ORDER signed by Judge Morrison C. England, Jr., on 8/21/12 ORDERING that 58 defendants' Motion for Summary Judgment is GRANTED in part and DENIED in part. Judgment shall be entered in favor of Defendants on the following claims: the third cause of action to the extent it alleges sexual harassment in violation of Title IX against Blumwald, and the ninth cause of action for intentional interference with prospective economic advantage against Blumwald. Summary judgment is DENIED with respect to Plaintiff's remaining claims. (Kastilahn, A)

extension.searchTitle: USCOURTS 2:08-cv-02835; Large v. Regents of the University of California, et al;

titleInfo.title: Large v. Regents of the University of California, et al
titleInfo.subTitle: MEMORANDUM AND ORDER signed by Judge Morrison C. England, Jr., on 8/21/12, ORDERING that the motion to compel mental examination is justied, so Defendants' 49 Motions seeking said relief are GRANTED. Plaintiff shall make herself available for mental examination within 30 days of the date this Order is electronically filed. Defendants shall disclose results of the mental examination report within three weeks after the examination is completed. Dr. Woods shall be produced for deposition up to three weeks after the report is disclosed. Defendants shall also be given the opportunity to retain an expert witness to address Plaintiff's new claims regarding her career prospects. Should Plaintiff choose to retain an expert, that expert's identity must be disclosed within 30 days of the date this Order is electronically filed. Trial in this matter remains set for 12/3/2012. (Kastilahn, A)
